mapper.select: SELECT devices.id,devices.deviceid,devices.model,devices.comments,devices.longitude,devices.latitude,devices.firstuptime,devices.updatetime, devices.state,devices.datastatus,devicetypes.id,devicetypes.name,devicetypes.comments,areas.id,areas.name,areas.size,areas.position, areas.parentarea_id FROM devices join devicetypes on devices.devicetype_id = devicetypes.id join areas on devices.area_id = areas.id

SELECT devices.id,devices.deviceid,devices.model,devices.comments,devices.longitude,devices.latitude,devices.firstuptime,devices.updatetime, devices.state,devices.datastatus,devicetypes.id,devicetypes.name,devicetypes.comments,areas.id,areas.name,areas.size,areas.position, areas.parentarea_id FROM devices join devicetypes on devices.devicetype_id = devicetypes.id join areas on devices.area_id = areas.id WHERE devices.id = #{deviceId}
